member.name: T:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.CustomerStoreBæltsBroen
member.summary: Task 9 – Storebæltsbroen weekend discount A weekend discount is now to be introduced which means that if you drive across the bridge, Saturday or Sunday you get a 20% discount.This discount applies only to cars.The Brobizz discount must be deducted afterwards the weekend discount. Check how much you've tested your code through Code Coverage. Write Test so you have covered your code reasonably. NOTE: Remember to give the test methods a descriptive name Remember to commit and push
